name: ALM Works
overview:
ALM Works is a software development company that focuses on application lifecycle management and software development process.

Our goal is to make it easy for everyone involved in a project to follow, maintain and improve processes that exist in an organization.

We work towards this goal by doing two things. First, we are creating a software platform for supporting any process where “tracking”, “workflow”, “change control” are relevant words. This includes issue tracking, requirements management, task & time management, testing process management and other processes.

At the same time, using this platform, we are building concrete applications that are targeted at specific processes or that integrate with specific products.
